definitions.definition: To harpoon or spear (a whale) with a weapon that has a drogue attached.
To act as a drogue, slowing down and stabilizing a drifting object.
To transport small loads along the coastline to larger ports, where they can be added to the cargo of larger ships that make longer journeys.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To harpoon or spear (a whale) with a weapon that has a drogue attached.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To use a drogue with.
( intransitive ) To act as a drogue, slowing down and stabilizing a drifting object.
( transitive ) To transport small loads along the coastline to larger ports, where they can be added to the cargo of larger ships that make longer journeys.
